titleStmt.title: Cantus: Ayres, or Fa las for three voyces. Newly composed and published by Iohn Hilton, Bachelor of Musicke
titleStmt.author: Hilton, John, 1599-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humfrey Lownes, and are to be sold by George Latham at the Bishops head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "Bassus" and "Quintus" have separate dated title pages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
